verbose_text: In addition, CHOP inhibits prosurvival protein Bcl-2 and induces proapoptotic factors Bim, telomere repeat binding factor 3 (TRB3), and death receptor 5 (DR5).
evidence: CHOP inhibits prosurvival protein Bcl-2 and induces proapoptotic factors Bim, telomere repeat binding factor 3 (TRB3), and death receptor 5
